headline.main: Trump Orders Review of Obama Waterway Regulation
headline.print_headline: Trump Orders Review of Obama Waterway Regulation

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump signed an order on Tuesday directing environmental regulators to review an Obama-era rule that expanded the number of federally protected waterways as the president targets regulations that conservatives consider government overreach.

headline.main: Obama, Out of Office 10 Days, Speaks Out Against Immigration Ban
headline.print_headline: No Vitriol,  but Obama Speaks Out Against Ban

docs.lead_paragraph: A statement issued after a weekend of protests said Mr. Obama “fundamentally disagrees with the notion of discriminating against individuals because of their faith or religion.”

headline.main: Trump Revokes Obama Guidelines on Transgender Bathrooms
headline.print_headline: Trump Revokes Obama Guidelines on Transgender Bathrooms

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump's administration on Wednesday revoked landmark guidance to public schools letting transgender students use the bathroom of their choice, reversing a signature initiative of former Democratic President Barack Obama.

headline.kicker: Anderson, Ind., A Newly Democratic Town, Assesses Obama
headline.main: A Newly Democratic Town Assesses Obama

headline.main: Trump's Boeing Speech Shows Differences With Obama
headline.print_headline: Trump's Boeing Speech Shows Differences With Obama

docs.lead_paragraph: Presidents since Franklin Delano Roosevelt have loved to tour Boeing factories. The lessons they draw from their time on the factory floor — and the inevitable photo opportunity beside shiny new airplanes — can differ wildly.

headline.main: Obama Designates Two New National Monuments, Protecting 1.65 Million Acres
headline.print_headline: Obama Designates Monuments in Nevada and Utah

docs.lead_paragraph: The monuments are Mr. Obama’s latest effort to protect public lands and waters from development and to nail down his environmental legacy before leaving office.

headline.main: Trump’s Plan to Fight ISIS Includes Calling It by That Name

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: An executive memorandum President Trump signed on Saturday afternoon repeatedly referred to the Islamic State as ISIS — not ISIL, as President Barack Obama had called the terrorist group since 2014.
